article_title: Remember The Public Option? Senate Democrats Wanted To Let States Opt Out Of That, Too

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: Halbig's critics still claim it's absurd to think congressional Democrats would let states opt out of the PPACA's Exchange subsidies, even as the law's authors concede they had advocated allowing states to opt out of Exchange subsidies, a public option, and various other proposals.
